title: " Beginner's Gardening Guide: Grow Your First Garden Like a Pro in Just 90 Seconds! "

subtasks: Clear garden area of weeds and debris
Loosen soil and add organic matter
Decide garden setup (in-ground, raised beds, containers)
Follow seed packet instructions for planting depth and spacing
Water plants gently and optimally (morning or late afternoon)
Apply mulch for moisture retention and weed suppression
Prune plants regularly for growth and pest management
Harvest vegetables, herbs, and flowers appropriately
Click the bell icon for notifications
